home.heroSubtitle: Smart package delivery matching travelers along your route
home.feature1Description: Our algorithm matches packages with couriers traveling the same route
home.feature2Description: Protected transactions with Stripe. Money held in escrow until delivery confirmed
home.feature3Description: Track your package every step of the way with live location updates
home.feature4Description: Couriers bid on deliveries, giving you the best possible price
home.step1Description: Enter pickup and delivery locations with package details
home.step2Description: Couriers traveling your route submit price proposals
home.step3Description: Choose your preferred courier and pay securely
home.step4Description: Follow real-time updates until successful delivery
home.courierStep1Description: Tell us where you're traveling and when
home.courierStep2Description: See packages along your route that need delivery
home.courierStep3Description: Propose your price for delivering packages
home.ctaDescription: Join thousands of senders and couriers using Chaski
home.chooseRoleDescription: Whether you need to send packages or earn money on your travels, we've got you covered.
home.senderCardDescription: Need to send a package? Find verified couriers traveling along your route at a fraction of traditional shipping costs.
home.courierCardDescription: Already traveling? Earn money by delivering packages along your route. Set your own schedule and rates.
home.featuresDescription: Our platform is designed to make package delivery simple, safe, and affordable.
home.featureVerifiedDescription: All couriers are verified. Real-time tracking and secure payments protect every delivery.
home.featureFastDescription: Smart route matching finds couriers already going your way for faster, more efficient delivery.
home.featureSaveMoneyDescription: Skip expensive shipping companies. Pay fair prices directly to trusted local couriers.

terms.title: MyChaski Terms of Service
terms.section1Content: By accessing or using the MyChaski platform ("Platform"), you agree to be legally bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree, you must not use the Platform. MyChaski ("Company", "we", "us") reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. Continued use of the Platform constitutes acceptance of modified Terms.
terms.section2Content: MyChaski is a digital marketplace that facilitates peer-to-peer delivery arrangements between individuals shipping items ("Senders") and individuals voluntarily transporting items along their travel routes ("Couriers").
terms.section2Item5: assume responsibility for possession or transit of items.
terms.section2NotCarrier: MyChaski is not a transportation carrier.
terms.section2NoGuarantee: MyChaski does not guarantee that a Sender will find a Courier or that a Courier will find a delivery opportunity. Availability of matches depends on User activity and geographic factors.
terms.section2NoCommercial: Users may not use the Platform to perform commercial shipping or high-volume logistics unless explicitly authorized by MyChaski. The Platform is intended for peer-to-peer, personal deliveries only.
terms.section3Intro: To use the Platform, you represent and warrant that:
terms.section3Item1: you are at least 18 years of age,
terms.section3Item2: you have legal capacity to enter into binding contracts,
terms.section3Item3: you are using your true identity, and
terms.section3Item4: your account is personally registered to you.
terms.section4Item1: provide truthful, accurate, and complete information during registration,
terms.section4Item2: maintain and promptly update your information,
terms.section4Item4: accept full responsibility for all activity under your account.
terms.section4Suspension: MyChaski reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to suspend or terminate accounts for suspected fraud, misuse, or violation of these Terms.
terms.section5Intro: Couriers must complete identity verification through Stripe Identity or another verification provider authorized by MyChaski. This may include submission of:
terms.section5Item5: other information required for fraud prevention.
terms.section5Failure: Failure to complete or pass verification may restrict or suspend Courier privileges and payment access.
terms.section5Additional: MyChaski reserves the right to request additional identification, documentation, or verification at any time for security, compliance, or fraud-prevention purposes.
terms.section5NoGuarantee: MyChaski does not guarantee the identity, background, or character of any User. MyChaski does not conduct criminal background checks unless required by applicable law. Users interact with other Users at their own risk.
terms.section5GPSConsent: By using the Platform as a Courier, you consent to the collection and use of your real-time GPS location data while actively handling a delivery. This data is used to provide tracking updates to Senders and Recipients. You may disable location services at any time; however, doing so may affect your ability to complete deliveries and maintain your account in good standing.
terms.section6Intro: Couriers are independent individuals and not:
terms.section6ResponsibilityItem4: obtaining and maintaining appropriate insurance coverage.
terms.section6NoInsurance: MyChaski does not provide or extend any form of insurance coverage to Users. Any insurance required by law or desired for protection is solely the responsibility of the respective User.
terms.section6NoEmployment: Nothing in this Agreement shall be construed as creating employment or contractor status.
terms.section6TaxResponsibility: Couriers are solely responsible for reporting and remitting all applicable federal, state, and local taxes, including income taxes and self-employment taxes. MyChaski may issue IRS Form 1099 or other tax documents as required by law. You agree to indemnify MyChaski for any tax-related claims arising from your failure to comply with tax obligations.
terms.section6LocalLaws: Users are solely responsible for ensuring compliance with all applicable local, state, federal, and international laws and regulations governing their activities on the Platform, including but not limited to transportation, commerce, and licensing requirements. MyChaski assumes no responsibility for Users' non-compliance with any law.
terms.section7Intro: Users shall not ship or transport:
terms.section7Item7: currency, cash, negotiable instruments, or prepaid cards,
terms.section7Item8: items requiring government permits or specialized handling, or
terms.section7MaxValue: Additionally, the maximum declared value of any single item or package shipped via the Platform shall not exceed $500 USD.
terms.section7Disclosure: Senders must accurately disclose item contents and package appropriately.
terms.section7NoInspection: Users acknowledge that MyChaski does not inspect, confirm, or validate the contents of any package and is not responsible for misrepresentation of package contents by Users.
terms.section8Content: Senders and Couriers acknowledge that all shipping arrangements are conducted between private individuals, not with MyChaski. Users voluntarily assume all risks associated with item hand-off, possession, and transportation.
terms.section8Item3: reimburse for damage or loss, or
terms.section8Item4: intervene in transactional disagreements except at its sole discretion.
terms.section8NoBailmentContent: At no point does MyChaski take legal or physical possession of any package, nor does MyChaski create a bailment or custody relationship with respect to any item. All possession, transport, and custody remain solely between private individuals.
terms.section8NoRetention: Users agree not to assert any lien, retention right, or custodial claim against MyChaski for any package or contents thereof.
terms.section8PlatformAvailability: MyChaski does not guarantee that the Platform will be uninterrupted, error-free, or continuously available. The Platform may be subject to downtime, maintenance, or technical issues. MyChaski is not liable for any losses or damages arising from Platform unavailability.
terms.section9Content1: Senders agree to pay fees, charges, or delivery amounts as displayed at the time of transaction. Couriers agree that payment release may be subject to identity verification and/or delivery confirmation.
terms.section9Content2: Payments may be withheld if fraud, dispute, or irregular activity is suspected.
terms.section9FeesNonRefundable: Platform service fees charged by MyChaski are non-refundable, except where required by applicable law. In the event of a canceled delivery, refund eligibility is determined at MyChaski's sole discretion based on the circumstances of the cancellation.
terms.section9ChargebackContent: Users agree not to initiate payment reversals, chargebacks, or financial disputes through their bank or payment provider for completed deliveries. All disputes must be handled through the dispute-resolution process within the Platform. Attempts to reverse payment may result in account suspension and debt recovery action.
terms.section10Item2: engage in harassment, threats, or abuse,
terms.section10Violation: Violation may result in account removal without notice.
terms.section10NoResponsibilityContent: MyChaski is not responsible for the actions, conduct, behavior, representations, or omissions of any User, whether online or offline. All interactions between Users are solely their responsibility.
terms.section10Communication: Users are solely responsible for communication regarding pickup, transit coordination, and delivery arrangements. MyChaski is not responsible for miscommunication or scheduling failures between Users.
terms.section11Intro: Users may leave ratings and written reviews. Reviews must be:
terms.section11Removal: MyChaski reserves the right to remove reviews that violate these Terms.
terms.section12Intro: To the maximum extent permitted by law:
terms.section12Item1: MyChaski disclaims all liability for loss, theft, misdelivery, property damage, or personal injury arising from interactions between Users.
terms.section12Item2: MyChaski is not liable for indirect, incidental, punitive, or consequential damages.
terms.section12Item3: Total liability to any User shall not exceed the greater of:
terms.section12Item3b: (b) the total amount paid to MyChaski by the User in the preceding 12 months.
terms.section13Intro: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless MyChaski, its officers, employees, and affiliates from any claims, legal actions, penalties, damages, or expenses resulting from:
terms.section14Content: Any disputes shall be resolved through binding arbitration in the state of Texas, under the rules of the American Arbitration Association. Users waive their right to:
terms.section14Item2: participating in class-action or collective lawsuits.
terms.section14ArbitrationFirst: Before initiating any legal action, police report, or external dispute, Users agree to first attempt resolution through MyChaski's internal dispute-resolution process and, if unresolved, through binding arbitration as outlined above. Failure to follow this process may result in forfeiture of claims and account suspension.
terms.section15Content: MyChaski may suspend or terminate access to the Platform at any time, with or without cause, and without liability. Users may request account termination by contacting support.
terms.section16Content: If any provision of these Terms is found to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect.
terms.section17Content: These Terms are governed by the laws of the State of Texas, without regard to conflict-of-law principles.
terms.section18Content: All trademarks, logos, service marks, trade names, and platform features are the property of MyChaski and may not be used, reproduced, or distributed without prior written permission. Unauthorized use may result in legal action.
terms.section18UserContent: By posting reviews, ratings, messages, photos, or other content on the Platform, you grant MyChaski a non-exclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide license to use, reproduce, modify, display, and distribute such content in connection with the operation of the Platform. You represent that you own or have the right to grant such license and that the content does not infringe the rights of any third party.
terms.section19Content: Legal inquiries may be sent to:
terms.section20Intro: By using MyChaski, you acknowledge that:
terms.section20Item3: you agree to be legally bound by them.
terms.privacyReference: By using the Platform, you also agree to our

privacy.friendlySummary: We only collect what we need, we never sell your data, and you can request deletion at any time.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Content: At MyChaski, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform. Please read this policy carefully to understand our practices regarding your personal data.
privacy.section2_1Item1: Account Information: Name, email address, phone number, password
privacy.section2_1Item2: Profile Information: Preferred language, default addresses
privacy.section2_1Item3: Identity Verification: Government-issued ID for couriers (processed by Stripe Identity)
privacy.section2_1Item4: Payment Information: Payment method details (processed by Stripe)
privacy.section2_1Item5: Package Information: Pickup/delivery addresses, package descriptions
privacy.section2_2Item1: Device Information: Device type, operating system, browser type
privacy.section2_2Item2: Usage Data: Pages visited, features used, time spent on platform
privacy.section2_2Item3: Location Data: IP address, approximate location for matching
privacy.section2_2Item4: Cookies: Session cookies for authentication and preferences
privacy.section2_2GPSContent: If you enable precise GPS location services on your device, we may use that information to improve route matching and delivery accuracy. You may disable location permissions at any time through your device settings.
privacy.section3Intro: We use your information for the following purposes:
privacy.section3Item1: Providing and improving our platform services
privacy.section3Item3: Matching senders with couriers based on routes
privacy.section3Item5: Communicating with you about your account and deliveries
privacy.section3Item6: Detecting and preventing fraud or abuse
privacy.section3Item8: Analyzing usage to improve user experience
privacy.section3Messaging: Messages exchanged within the Platform may be stored for moderation, safety, and dispute-resolution purposes.
privacy.section3Anonymized: We may use anonymized and aggregated data for analytics, performance monitoring, and service improvement. This data does not identify individual users.
privacy.section4Intro: We may share your information in the following circumstances:
privacy.section4Item1: With Other Users: Senders can see courier names; couriers can see sender names and addresses for deliveries
privacy.section4Item2: Service Providers: Third parties who help us operate our platform (Stripe, Twilio, AWS)
privacy.section4Item3: Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
privacy.section4Item4: Business Transfers: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
privacy.section4NoSell: We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
privacy.section5Intro: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data:
privacy.section5Item1: Encryption of sensitive data in transit and at rest
privacy.section5Storage: Your data may be stored and processed in the United States or other jurisdictions where our service providers operate.
privacy.section6Content: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. We may retain certain information for longer periods for legal, tax, or regulatory purposes. You may request deletion of your account, subject to our legal obligations.
privacy.section7Intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:
privacy.section7Item1: Access: Request a copy of your personal data
privacy.section7Item2: Correction: Request correction of inaccurate data
privacy.section7Item3: Deletion: Request deletion of your data
privacy.section7Item4: Portability: Request transfer of your data to another service
privacy.section7Item5: Opt-out: Opt out of marketing communications
privacy.section7Contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@mychaski.com.
privacy.section8Content: We use essential cookies to enable authentication and remember your preferences. We do not use third-party tracking cookies for advertising. You can control cookies through your browser settings, though disabling them may affect platform functionality.
privacy.section9Content: Our Service is not intended for individuals under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we learn we have collected data from a child, we will delete it promptly.
privacy.section10Content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of material changes by email or through the platform. Your continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
privacy.section11Intro: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

courierAgreement.title: Courier Agreement
courierAgreement.importantContent: This agreement is required for all users who wish to act as couriers on the MyChaski platform. Please read it carefully before accepting delivery requests.
courierAgreement.section1Content: You acknowledge and agree that you are an independent contractor and not an employee, agent, or partner of MyChaski. You are solely responsible for:
courierAgreement.section1Disclaimer: MyChaski does not control the manner or method of your work and does not provide employment benefits.
courierAgreement.section1NoGuarantee: You understand that MyChaski does not guarantee any minimum earnings, trip availability, or delivery opportunities. You are responsible for choosing your work schedule and delivery engagement.
courierAgreement.section2Content: Before you can accept delivery requests, you must complete identity verification through our secure third-party provider (Stripe Identity). This verification:
courierAgreement.section2Item2: May include a selfie for identity confirmation
courierAgreement.section2Item3: Must be successfully completed before accepting deliveries
courierAgreement.section2Item4: May need to be repeated periodically
courierAgreement.section2Warning: Providing false or fraudulent identification is grounds for immediate account termination.
courierAgreement.section3Intro: As a Courier, you agree to:
courierAgreement.section3Item1: Handle all packages with reasonable care
courierAgreement.section3Item5: Report any issues or delays promptly
courierAgreement.section3Item6: Not open, inspect, or tamper with packages
courierAgreement.section4Item2: Transport items you suspect may be illegal
courierAgreement.section4Item3: Share sender or recipient personal information
courierAgreement.section4Item4: Arrange deliveries outside the MyChaski platform
courierAgreement.section4Item5: Accept cash payments from senders or recipients
courierAgreement.section4Item7: Engage in any unsafe driving practices
courierAgreement.section4Confidentiality: You may not use any data obtained through the Platform (including user names, addresses, or routes) for any purpose other than fulfilling a delivery. Data obtained through the Platform may not be stored, sold, copied, or reused outside the delivery process.
courierAgreement.section5Item1: You are responsible for maintaining appropriate vehicle insurance
courierAgreement.section5Item2: MyChaski is not responsible for damage to packages in your care
courierAgreement.section5Item3: You may be held liable for lost, stolen, or damaged packages due to negligence
courierAgreement.section5Item4: You should consider obtaining additional liability insurance
courierAgreement.section5Indemnification: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless MyChaski, its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, costs, or expenses (including reasonable attorney's fees) arising from your actions, negligence, violations of this Agreement, or violations of any applicable law while acting as a Courier.
courierAgreement.section6Content: Compensation for deliveries is determined by the bidding process on our platform. You agree that:
courierAgreement.section6Item1: Payment is processed through Stripe after delivery confirmation
courierAgreement.section6Item2: MyChaski deducts a service fee from each transaction
courierAgreement.section6Item3: You are responsible for setting up and maintaining your payout account
courierAgreement.section6Item4: Payment disputes will be resolved according to our dispute resolution process
courierAgreement.section6NoGuarantee: Delivery opportunities are not guaranteed. Courier availability, user demand, and geographic distribution may affect the frequency of delivery requests.
courierAgreement.section7Content: Your performance on the platform is tracked through ratings and reviews. Consistently low ratings or policy violations may result in:
courierAgreement.section7Item1: Reduced visibility in the matching algorithm
courierAgreement.section7Item3: Permanent account termination for severe violations
courierAgreement.section8Content: You agree to conduct yourself professionally and safely at all times:
courierAgreement.section8Item1: Follow all traffic laws and safety regulations
courierAgreement.section8Item2: Never operate a vehicle under the influence
courierAgreement.section8Item3: Treat all users with respect and professionalism
courierAgreement.section8Item5: Comply with requests from law enforcement
courierAgreement.section9Content: In case of disputes regarding deliveries or payments:
courierAgreement.section9Item1: First attempt to resolve through our in-app support system
courierAgreement.section9Item2: Provide all relevant documentation and evidence
courierAgreement.section9Item4: Accept final decisions made by our dispute resolution team
courierAgreement.section10Content: Either party may terminate this agreement at any time. MyChaski may terminate your courier status immediately for:
courierAgreement.section10Item1: Violation of this agreement or our Terms of Service
courierAgreement.section11Content: By accepting this Courier Agreement, you confirm that you:
courierAgreement.section11Item1: Are at least 18 years of age
courierAgreement.section11Item2: Have a valid driver's license (if applicable)
courierAgreement.section11Item3: Have read and understood this entire agreement
courierAgreement.section11Item4: Agree to all terms and conditions stated herein
courierAgreement.section11Item5: Will comply with all applicable laws and regulations
courierAgreement.section12Content: For questions about this Courier Agreement, please contact us:
